content: add some fun spring/easter decor with this sweet bunny wall hanging crochet pattern the pdf includes detailed instructions and photos as well as easy print pages for more advanced crocheters or for a printed hard copy the free written pattern can be found here 1 on my blog **materials ** * worsted weight yarn * 5mm crochet hook * 4mm crochet hook * 10mm safety eyes * 4 ply yarn in black or black embroidery floss * 6mm dowel rod * twine/yarn for hanging * yarn needle scissors the finished item measure approximately 4 5 wide x 5 25 long 11 5cm x 13 5cm item size may vary depending on gauge and materials used 1 https //www stitchbyfay com/mini-bunny-wall-hanging-crochet-pattern/
